Author: llama1122
Text: Ahhhh I'm dealing with this right now too!   Tbh I'm thinking about just removing this friend from my life. I can't deal with her constant obsession and fat this, fat that, gahhh

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I’m sorry your friends are so focused on it and vocal about it right now, especially since they’re aware it’s something you’re struggling with. I don’t have great suggestions (my go-to is try to make a lighthearted comment and shift the topic in a safer direction, but I’m super not smooth at it.) Just know that there really are people out there who don’t talk about this stuff, or minimally mention it <3 Makes for much more interesting conversations too.
